name: Tartarus Crawl Control Plugin for WordPress
author: coderevolution

sections.description: This plugin puts you in control of your website's crawl rate by bots and spiders.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2016-11-11
  • First version released!
Version 1.1 Release Date 2017-01-06
  • Fixed major bug in agent detection.
Version 1.2 Release Date 2017-02-03
  • Added multisite support
